channel.title: Aria Ghora's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Aria Ghora's Blog

item.description: Hi. My name is Aria Ghora Prabono. I am: A researcher. My research topic is machine learning and domain adaptation with their applications for wellbeing. Check my research works here A seasonal software developer. I code in python for my primary job, and I code in pascal for my, well, hobby. I love pascal. I grow up with pascal. Check my open-source codes here. Reach me at hello[at]ghora.net
